timeline.message: CLOUD-68: Avoid storing passwords in clear text on disk

- Remove minion-identity bundle and instead split out the rest client as a separate bundle
- Share the controller config with th rest client

grpc scv impl depends on core-impl
rest client depends on grpc scv impl and on core-impl

These have to be separate to avoid circular deps
